mapper.insert: insert into product_table (product_name, product_img1, product_img2, product_description, product_price, category_ID) values (#{productName}, #{productImg1}, #{productImg2}, #{productDescription}, #{productPrice}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, product_img1, product_img2, product_description,product_price, product_date, category_id from product_table;
select product_id, product_name, product_img1, product_img2, product_description,product_price, product_date, category_id from product_table where product_id = #{productId}
